mapper.insert: insert into notice (userNum, title, content, fixed) values (#{userNum}, #{title}, #{content}, #{fixed})
mapper.update: update notice set userNum=#{userNum}, title=#{title}, content=#{content}, fixed=#{fixed} where noticeNum=#{noticeNum}
mapper.select: SELECT noticeNum, title, createdAt FROM notice ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT 3
select * from notice order by noticeNum desc limit #{num},10
